name: La peine de mort en Arabie saoudite, notamment les cas de Mustafa Hashem al Darwish et d'Abdullah al-Howaiti - The death penalty in Saudi Arabia, notably the cases of Mustafa Hashem al-Darwish and Abdullah al-Howaiti - Todesstrafe in Saudi-Arabien, insbesondere die Fälle von Mustafa Haschim al Darwisch und Abdullah al-Huwaiti -  - § 8/1
title: Resolution on the death penalty in Saudi Arabia, notably the cases of Mustafa Hashem al-Darwish and Abdullah al-Howaiti
